description: This service provides methods to list, create and apply presets.

fetchScenePrototype.description: Fetch a prototype scene for the specified scope.

params.name: scope
params.description: The scope used to populate the thing states.

fetchScenes.description: Fetch the available scenes within a given scope.

params.name: query
params.description: The scope used to restrict the contents of the list.

deleteScenes.description: Delete the scene matching the specified query

params.name: query
params.description: A query matching the scenes to be deleted.

params.name: scene
params.description: The uuid of the scene to be stored.

returns.description: The state of the scene, as saved in the configuration

applyScene.description: Apply the scene state to the scene things.

params.name: id
params.description: The uuid of the scene to be applied.

returns.description: The original state of the scene.

scope.description: A string of the form site, site:{site-id} or room:{room-id}.

slot.description: The slot number of the preset.

scene.description: A scene describe a set of things and their corresponding states.

scope.description: A string of the form site, site:{site-id} or room:{room-id}.

slot.description: The slot number of the scene.

thing-state.description: A thing-state describes a thing and set of associated channel states.

channel-state.description: A channel-state describes a thing and set of associated channel states.

state.description: The preset state of the channel.
